chapter.text: 37|1|Yi lie ban zhe fashi,
37|2|yi quce zhe fashi,
37|3|yi songdu jiaohui zhe fashi,
37|4|nimen suo dang chongbai de, que shi du yi de
37|5|ta shi tiandi wanwu zhi zhu, shi yiqie dongfang de zhu.
37|6|Wo que yi yong wencai ji fanxing dianzhui zuijin de tian,
37|7|wo dui yiqie panni de emo baohu ta,
37|8|tamen bude qieting shang jie de zhong tianshi, tamen zi ge fang bei sheji,
37|9|bei quzhu, tamen jiang shou yongjiu de xingfa.
37|10|Dan qieting yici de, canlan de liuxing jiu zhuigan shang ta.
37|11|Ni wen tamen ba! Jiujing shi tamen geng nan zao ne? Haishi wo suo chuangzao de geng nan zao ne? Wo que yi yong zhan ni chuangzaole tamen,
37|12|buran! Ni gandao jingqi, er tamen que chaoxiao.
37|13|Tamen sui wen jiaohui, que bu juewu.
37|14|Tamen sui jian jixiang, que jiayi chaoxiao
37|15|tamen shuo:“Zhege zhishi mingxian de moshu.
37|16|Nandao women si hou, yi bian wei chentu he xiu gu de shihou, biding fuhuo ma?
37|17|Lian women de zuxian, ye yao fuhuo ma?”
37|18|Ni shuo:“Shi de! Nimen dou yao beijian di bei fuhuo.”
37|19|Cai tingjian yisheng nahan, tamen jiu zhanwangzhe,
37|20|tamen shuo:“Shang zai women! Zhe jiushi baoying zhi ri.”
37|21|Zhe jiushi nimen suo fouren de panjue zhi ri.
37|22|Nimen yingdang jihe bu yi zhe he tamen de banlu, yiji tamen she an la er chongbai de,
37|23|ranhou zhishi tamen huo yu de daolu,
37|24|bing lanzhu tamen, yinwei tamen dique yao shoushen wen.
37|25|Nimen zenme bu huzhu ne?
37|26|Buran! Tamen zai jinri shi guishun de.
37|27|Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun,
37|28|zhexie ren shuo:“Nimen que yi yong quanli xiepo women.”
37|29|Naxie ren shuo:“Buran! Nimen ziji yuanlai bu shi xindao zhe,
37|30|women dui nimen jue wu quanli. Buran! Nimen shi beini de minzhong.
37|31|Gu women yingdang shou women de zhu de panjue, women que shi changshi de.
37|32|Suo yi women shi nimen mi wu, women ziji ye queshi shi mi wu de.”
37|33|Zai na ri, tamen biding tong shou xingfa.
37|34|Wo biding zheyang duidai fanzui zhe.
37|35|Tamen que shi zheyang de: Youren dui tamen shuo:“Chu an la wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de,” tamen jiu wang zizun da,
37|36|bingqie shuo:“Nandao women wubi yao wei yige kuangwang de shiren, er paoqi women de zhong shenling ma?”
37|37|Buran! Ta zhaoshile zhenli, bing zhengshile lidai de shizhe.
37|38|Nimen biding changshi tongku de xingfa,
37|39|nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou.
37|40|Wei an la de qiancheng de zhong pu,
37|41|jiang xiangshou yi zhong kezhi de jiyang——
37|42|ge zhong shuiguo, tongshi tamen shi shou youdai de;
37|43|tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong,
37|44|tamen zuo zai chuangshang, bici xiangdui;
37|45|youren yi beizi zai tamen zhi jian ai ci chuandi, bei zhong man sheng liquan,
37|46|yanse jiebai, yin zhe wubu cheng wei meiwei;
37|47|liquan zhong wu mazui wu, tamen ye bu yin ta er mingding;
37|48|tamen jiang you bushi feili de, mei mudi banlu,
37|49|tamen fangfu bei zhencang de tuo luan yang;
37|50|yushi tamen zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun.
37|51|Tamen zhong youyigeren shuo:“Wo you yi ge pengyou,
37|52|ta wen wo:‘Ni que shi chengxin de ma?
37|53|Nandao women si hou, yi bian wei chentu he xiu gu de shihou, hai biding yao shou baochou ma?’”
37|54|Ta shuo:“Nimen yuan kan ta ma?”
37|55|Ta fushi xiamian, jiu kanjian ta zai huo yu de zhongyang,
37|56|ta shuo:“Yi an la fashi, ni dique jihu xianhaile wo.
37|57|Ruguo meiyou wo de zhu de enhui, wo bi zai bei jujin zhe zhi lie.
37|58|Women bushi zai si de ma?
37|59|Wei you women chuci de siwang, er women jue bu hui shou chengfa ma?
37|60|Zhe que shi weida de chenggong,
37|61|gongzuo zhe yingdang wei huode zheyang de chenggong er gongzuo.”
37|62|Na shi geng shan de kuandai ne? Haishi zan hu shu?
37|63|Wo yi ta wei bu yi zhe de zhemo.
37|64|Ta shi zai huo yu di shengzhang de yi ke shu,
37|65|ta de hua bi, fangfu mo tou.
37|66|Tamen biding yao chi naxie guoshi, er yi ta chongshi du fu.
37|67|Ranhou tamen biding yao zai naxie guoshi shang jia yin feishui de hun tang,
37|68|ranhou tamen biding guiyu huo yu.
37|69|Tamen biding hui faxian tamen de zuxian shi mi wu de,
37|70|Tamen que yizhe tamen de zongji er benchi.
37|71|Zai tamen zhiqian, daban de guren que yi mi wule.
37|72|Wo zai tamen zhi jian, que yi paiqianguo xuduo jinggao zhe.
37|73|Ni kan! Bei jinggao zhe de jieju shi zenyang de?
37|74|Chufei an la de chunjie de purenmen.
37|75|Nu ha que yi xiang wo qidao, wo shi zui shanyu yingda de!
37|76|Wo zhengjiu ta he ta de xintumen taoli da nan.
37|77|Wo zhi shi ta de zisun deyi shengcun.
37|78|Wo shi ta de ling ming, yongcun yu houdai.
37|79|Zai ge minzu zhong, dou youren shuo:“Zhu nu ha ping'an!”
37|80|Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhemen.
37|81|Ta que shi wo de xindao de puren.
37|82|Ranhou, wo shi bie de ren yan si.
37|83|Ta de zongpai zhong, que you yi bo la xin.
37|84|Dangshi, ta daizhe jianquan de xinling, lai jian ta de zhu.
37|85|Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen chongbai shenme?
37|86|Nandao nimen yu she an la er beimiu de chongbai xuduo shenling ma?
37|87|Nimen dui zhong shijie de zhu, jiujing zuo shenme caice?”
37|88|Ta kan yi kan xingsu,
37|89|ranhou shuo:“Wo shibi yaohai bing.”
37|90|Tamen jiu beilile ta,
37|91|ta jiu qiaoqiao de zouxiang tamen de zhong shenling, ta shuo:“Nimen zenme bu chi dongxi ne?
37|92|Nimen zenme bu shuohua ne?”
37|93|Ta jiu qiaoqiao de yi youshou daji tamen.
37|94|Zhongren jiu ji ji mang mang de lai kan ta,
37|95|ta shuo:“Nimen chongbai ziji suo diaoke de ouxiang ma?
37|96|An la chuangzao nimen, he nimen de xingwei.”
37|97|Tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang wei ta er xiu yige huolu, ranhou jiang ta tou zai liehuo zhong.”
37|98|Tamen yu mouhai ta, er wo que shi tamen bian cheng zhan xiafeng de.
37|99|Ta shuo:“Wo guoran yao qianyi dao wo de zhu suo qishi wo di difang qu, ta jiang zhidao wo.
37|100|Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shangci wo yige shanliang de erzi.”
37|101|Wo jiu yi yige kuanhou de ertong xiang ta baoxi.

37|102|Dang ta zhang dao neng bangzhe ta caozuo de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de xiaozi a! Wo que yi meng jian wo zai ni wei xisheng. Ni kaolu yixia! Ni jiujing you she me yijian?” Ta shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni zhixing ni suo feng de mingling ba! Ruguo an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de.”
37|103|Ta lia ji yi shunfu an la, er ta shi ta de erzi ce wozhe.
37|104|Wo hanjiao shuo:“Yi bo la xin a!
37|105|Ni que yi zhengshi nage mengle.” Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan de renmen.
37|106|Zhe que shi mingxian de kaoyan.
37|107|Wo yi yige weida de xisheng shule ta.
37|108|Wo shi ta de ling ming, yongcun yu houdai.
37|109|“Zhu yi bo la xin ping'an!”
37|110|Wo zheyang baochou xingshan zhe.
37|111|Ta que shi wo de xindao de puren,
37|112|wo yi jiang wei xianzhi he qinglian zhe de yi si ha ge xiang ta baoxi.
37|113|Wo jiang fu yu ta he yi si ha ge. Ta lia de zisun zhong, jiang you xingshan zhe he gongran zibaoziqi zhe.
37|114|Wo que yi shi en yu mu sa he ha lun.
37|115|Wo ceng shi ta lia ji qi zongzu, de mian yu da nan.
37|116|Wo ceng yuanzhu tamen, suoyi tamen shi shengli zhe.
37|117|Wo shouyu ta lia xiangming de jingdian,
37|118|wo zhiyin ta lia zhengzhi de daolu,
37|119|wo shi ta lia de ling ming, yongcun yu houdai.
37|120|“Zhu mu sa he ha lun ping'an!”
37|121|Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhe.
37|122|Ta lia que shi wo de xindao de puren.
37|123|Yi lei ya si que shi shizhe.
37|124|Dangshi, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nandao nimen bu jingwei an la ma?
37|125|Nandao nimen qidao bai er li, er she zui youyue de chuangzao zhe——
37|126|an la, nimen de zhu, nimen zuxian de zhu ma?”
37|127|Tamen fouren ta, suoyi tamen biding yao bei jujin.
37|128|Wei an la de chunjie de zhong pu ze buran.
37|129|Wo shi ta de ling ming, yongcun houdai.
37|130|“Zhu yi lei ya si ping'an!”
37|131|Wo biding yao zheyang baochou xingshan zhe.
37|132|Ta que shi wo de xindao de pu ren.
37|133|Lu te que shi shizhe.
37|134|Dangshi, wo zhengjiule ta, he ta de quanti xintu;
37|135|weiyou yige lao fu ren he qiyu de ren, meiyou huode zhengjiu.
37|136|Ranhou, wo huimiele bie de xuduo ren.
37|137|Nimen dique zhaoxi jingguo tamen de yiji,
37|138|nandao nimen bu liaojie ma?
37|139|You nu si que shi shizhe.
37|140|Dangshi, ta tao dao na zhi manzai de chuanbo shang.
37|141|Ta jiu nianjiu, ta que shi shibai de,
37|142|da yu jiu tunle ta, tongshi, ta shi ying shou qianze de.
37|143|Jiaruo ta bushi chang zansong an la zhe,
37|144|ta bi zangshen yu fu, zhidao shiren fuhuo zhi ri.
37|145|Ranhou, wo jiang ta pao zai handi shang, dangshi ta shi you bing de.
37|146|Wo shi yi ke hu gua, zhang qilai zhezhe ta.
37|147|Wo ceng paiqian ta qu jiaohua shi duo wan minzhong.
37|148|Tamen bian gui xin ta, wo shi tamen xiangle zhi yige dingqi.
37|149|Ni wen tamen ba! Ni de zhu you xuduo nu'er, tamen que you duo shao erzi ni?
37|150|Haishi wo ceng jiang zhong tianshi zaocheng nuxing de, tamen ceng yanjian wo de chuangzao ne?
37|151|Zhen de, tamen yinwei ziji de beimiu, biding yao shuo:
37|152|“An la yi shengyule.” Tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.
37|153|Nandao ta buyao erzi, que yao nu'er ma?
37|154|Nimen you she me liyou? Nimen zenme zheyang panduan ne?
37|155|Nimen hai bu juewu ma?
37|156|Nandao nimen you yige mingzheng ma?
37|157|Na chu nimen de jingdian lai ba, tangruo nimen shi chengshi de ren!
37|158|Tamen wangyan ta yu jingling zhi jian, youyinqin guanxi. Jingling que yi zhidao tamen jiang bei jujin
37|159|——chaojue zai an la! Ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de
37|160|wei an la de qiancheng de zhong pu,
37|161|nimen he nimen suo chongbai de,
37|162|jue buneng ba renhe ren yinyou qu chongbai tamen,
37|163|chufei shi jiang ru huo yu de ren.
37|164|(Zhong tianshi shuo):“Women ren ren dou you yige zhiding di diwei,
37|165|women biding shi pai ban de,
37|166|women biding shi zansong an la de.”
37|167|Tamen dique chang shuo:
37|168|“Jiaruo women you guren suo yiliu de jiaohui,
37|169|name, women bi shi an la de chunjie de puren.”
37|170|Tamen que buxin an la, tamen bujiu jiu zhidaole.
37|171|Wo dui wo suo paiqian de purenmen yi yue yan zai xianle,
37|172|tamen biding shi bei yuanzhu de,
37|173|wo de jundui, biding shi shengli de.
37|174|Ni zhanshi tuibi tamen ba!
37|175|Ni kanzhe ba! Tamen bujiu jiu kanjianle.
37|176|Nandao tamen yaoqiu wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma?
37|177|Wo de xingfa yidan jiang yu tamen de tingyuan de shihou, bei jinggao zhe de zaochen, zhen elie ya!
37|178|Ni zhanshi tuibi tamen ba!
37|179|Ni kanzhe ba! Tamen bujiu jiu kanjianle.
37|180|Chaojue zai ni de zhu——zun rong de zhuzai! Ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de.
37|181|Zhu zhong shizhe ping'an!
37|182|Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——yangyu zhong shijie de zhu!
